attributes.action: Block Southern Water from Gaining Planning Permission to Expand the Sludge and Treatment Works in Aylesford Kent
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Eccles and surrounding villages object to Southern Waters appeal on the following grounds:
•Bull Lane and surrounding road infrastructure is not sufficient for HGV traffic at present without a significant increase in movements
•The surrounding road infrastructure could not cope with the increase in traffic
•Southern Water will not restrict HGV movements during certain conditions such as Poor Weather
•No consideration has been made to the increased pollution of both the HGV and of the plant at times when the government are promoting “Green Policies”
•The current HGV drivers have no consideration and regularly drive on the pavements 
• Emergency services will have very restricted access to Eccles if there is an accident
•Southern Water and their independent consultants cannot agree on all the figures proposed and just blag their way through meetings
•Children cross Bull Lane numerous times per day to reach the small Village Primary Schooland to play on the open field

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
